# Intent-Garden Knowledge Base
> Deterministic substrate for AI & Critical Systems.

## Core Projects
- [Rule-ROM](https://rulerom.com): Intent Registry & C-Safety specs.
- [Garden-Core](https://github.com/intent-garden/core): Clang AST + Clojure Enforcer.
- [Decima8](https://decima8.org): Neuromorphic hardware substrate.

## Rules for Agents
All C-code generated for this ecosystem MUST comply with EDN contracts in /registry.
